data.event: The location is notable as being the place where Confederate General Stonewall Jackson died on May 10, 1863.

event.title: were placed on a one-car train at Guiney's Station on the morning of Monday, May 11, 1863

data.event: The human remains of General Stonewall Jackson were placed on a one-car train at Guiney's Station on the morning of Monday, May 11, 1863 for transport to Richmond.
